pullRequest.title: more micro optimizations
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hello @bbakerman @andimarek,
I did some more profiling with YourKit and found these new "opportunities":

JMH benchmark:
master
Benchmark                                    Mode  Cnt   Score   Error  Units
BenchMark.benchMarkSimpleQueriesThroughput  thrpt   15  47.091 ± 1.469  ops/s
BenchMark.benchMarkSimpleQueriesAvgTime      avgt   15  21.572 ± 1.113  ms/op

with FetchedValue fix
Benchmark                                    Mode  Cnt   Score   Error  Units
BenchMark.benchMarkSimpleQueriesThroughput  thrpt   15  47.069 ± 0.646  ops/s
BenchMark.benchMarkSimpleQueriesAvgTime      avgt   15  20.776 ± 0.804  ms/op

with CacheKey fix
Benchmark                                    Mode  Cnt   Score   Error  Units
BenchMark.benchMarkSimpleQueriesThroughput  thrpt   15  52.207 ± 1.457  ops/s
BenchMark.benchMarkSimpleQueriesAvgTime      avgt   15  19.707 ± 0.459  ms/op

IMHO is a small but important improvement for all users of the library!

commit.message:
introducing CacheKey for PropertyFecthingImpl

Avoiding some String concatenations in the hot-path.
